content:
How do I build cranelift? CI is failing but ./x.py build (and with --stage 2 as well) passes locally. Here's the PR: #78548

Cc @bjorn3 since you are the primary author of cg_cranelift
@Camelid ./x.py check builds it by default. For ./x.py build you will have to add "cranelift" to the codegen-backends array in config.toml.
